name: Survival Messenger
description:
Imagine you are on an island, isolated from your friends, but no - you find a mobile phone and you can chat with them. Let yourself being guided through a shared adventure that you undertake alone... #TogetheApart

You don't need a joystick, the game can be played with #MinimalInput, use Space key and number keys.

This game was created for the 7th Klagenfurt Game Jam by ComSha, Logiker, Neyvivi and Wil.
